text: @SpeakerPelosi Weren't you prancing around Chinatown at the end of February, encouraging everyone to join you, ignoring the threat of the #coronavirus ?  #DemocratsAreDestroyingAmerica with their typical hypocrisy & inability to become part of the solution.
